name: the love letter (cafedanslanuit)
description:
February 13th

As you wait in line for your morning coffee at your university's coffee shop, you can't stop thinking about the letter you had received this morning.

Just as you were leaving your room to go to your morning class, you realized someone had slipped a white envelope under your door. Maybe something for your roommate? You picked it up, your previous hypothesis quickly vanishing as you saw your name written on the other side of the envelope.

Quickly, you opened it, finding a small note inside.

...

Enter a College/University AU along with the characters of Shingeki no Kyojin / Attack on Titan! After receiving a mysterious letter from a secret admirer, you decide to find out who is behind it. Explore going to class (or skipping it!), going to the stadium to watch a football game, watching your friends have a tennis match, attending a bonfire and a lot more. And the end of the day, your choices will determine who has been hiding feelings for you all this time.

  • 11 available endings: 9 Good Endings with Eren, Mikasa, Armin, Reiner, Bertholdt, Annie, Zeke, Pieck and Porco + 2 Bad Endings
  • The reader is gender-neutral (no pronouns are used throughout the story) and racially ambiguous (no "raking their fingers across your hair" or "pink blushes")
  • Option to add your name/nickname so the characters can talk with you!
  • You can unlock secret passages when choosing different interactions with a character. And yes, those secret passages include even more kisses <3
